name: Lines Splitter
summary: Lines Splitter is a 2021 line puzzle game where you will have ultimate fun by solving line riddles. Lines Splitter has taken the puzzle standards to a whole new different level where creativity meets the brain power. In this brand new riddle game 2021 you will find one hundred exigent levels, a rich collection of Smileys, soothing sound and challenging puzzles that will cling you to the gameplay.
